abstract: New York City health officials report birth of first baby in city with Zika-related birth defect microcephaly; mother is believed to have been infected while traveling to one of 50 countries where Zika is endemic; about a dozen children have been born in United States with Zika-related microcephaly since spring, including births in New Jersey and Florida.
lead_paragraph: Health officials on Friday reported a baby born with microcephaly, a Zika-related condition marked by an abnormally small head and impaired brain development.

headline.main: A Grim First: New York City Reports Baby Born With a Zika-Related Defect
headline.print_headline: Grim First: City Reports Baby Is Born With Defect Related to Zika Virus

snippet: Health officials on Friday reported a baby born with microcephaly, a Zika-related condition marked by an abnormally small head and impaired brain development....
